features: ✅ Exquisite Workmanship - The unique design and perfect details make the whole decoration figure very lifelike. You will feel like your favorite characters are right here with you.
✅ Poseable Action Figures - There are multiple points of articulation on the hero action figure, so boys and girls aged 4 and up can pose them in any way they imagine for web-slinging adventures.

✅ Upgrated Toy Sets - Our garage kit toy set comes with a 6-inch action model and a wealth of accessories which include 1 head, 2 pairs of alternate eyes, 5 pairs of alternate hands, spider silk, 1 spider, 1 stand and multi-joint transparent support.

✅ 6 -Inch Action Figure Toy - The action figure inspired by the classic character design from the movie. It stands 6" tall and is highly detailed with individual sculpting and decoration to match its movie character.
✅ Perfect Gift - With a beautifully designed gift box, the spider hero action figure set is a perfect gift for children and teenagers. Movie fans will not refuse a cool action figure toy.

🔔 Upgrated Quality - We have upgraded the quality of our products according to feedback of buyers. Products on sales from October 1, 2023 are all high-quality versions, and the figures are less likely to be broken, especially the wrist joints. If hands of action figure are too tight to fit in, please soak the hands in hot water for few minutes.
body.description: Action Figure Toys Fans and collectors can display this fully articulated 6-inch scale action figure. It features poseable head, arms, and legs. In addtional, hero action figure functions as premium deco. Package included: a 6-inch action model, 1 alternate head, 2 pairs of alternate eyes, 5 pairs of alternate hands, spider silk, 1 spider, 1 stand and multi-joint transparent support. Immerse yourself into the world of hero and recreate the biggest battles and missions with action figures that look exactly like movie characters!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Product Features Fan favorite characters 17 points of articulation High quality detailing Exquisite gift box Extra accessories Pose and play Action Figure Toys Fans and collectors can display this fully articulated 6-inch scale action figure. It features poseable head, arms, and legs. In addtional, hero action figure functions as premium deco. Package included: a 6-inch action model, 1 alternate head, 2 pairs of alternate eyes, 5 pairs of alternate hands, spider silk, 1 spider, 1 stand and multi-joint transparent support. Immerse yourself into the world of hero and recreate the biggest battles and missions with action figures that look exactly like movie characters!

17 Points of Articulation With 17 points of articulation, you can pose or play in any way imaginable. Recreate your favorite moments, battles scenes, and attacks with these ultra poseable figures. Four Expressions 1 alternate head and 2 pairs of alternate eyes. By chaning the head or hands, four expressions can be choosed to match with different poses. Special Decoration Exceptional and exquisite collectible decoration suitable for themed hotels, internet cafes, coffee shops, bookstores, offices, bedrooms, or living room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome collectible figure - Very fragile
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice figure to display with a collection. It has many small accessories that can be changed to vary the look. I purchased this for my grandson's 5th birthday. It lasted him one day and then came apart at the midsection. It may be more suitable for an older child or adult as a collectable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome action figure
reviews.reviewText: My son really wanted a spider man action figure and I really didn’t want to go out and spend a bunch of money. He really enjoys the accessories like the hands. He hasn’t had trouble with switching out the hands; he does use it more for display and just changes the appearance. Good purchase overall

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poorly made, does not hold up to a careful 10yo child's playing
reviews.reviewText: My son was so excited to get this toy for Christmas because he loved all the extra articulation, that's something that is a big deal to him with his action figures.However, he accidentally dropped it while playing and it broke at the torso. After super gluing that back together, only a few days later the arm continuously pops out.I'm not sure if this anyone off and we got a defective item, or if overall this toy is poorly made.Sad and disappointed...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars SH FIGUARTS KO
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this because I didn't want to pay the $150+ aftermarket price of this spiderman fig. The figure is painted pretty good for a KO. I didn't have any trouble swapping hands I know some people have issues with the wrist joint breaking off even in mafex or revoltech figures but If you throw them into hot water for around 30 seconds it will loosen it up. So you wont have such a hard time swapping them.EDIT: 11/03/2023 I decided to try to do some cool poses with it and the arm completely came off and won't comeback on. I am not too disappointed because with KOs it's a gamble on how long they'll last. Unfortunately for me it didn't last too long, will use as fodder for customs or something.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: Durability on this action figure is 100% great. All the attachments can be easily put on and off and the mobility of this toy is great too! Good quality and ao affordable too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: No es del tamaño que sale en las fotos pero es de buen material y perfecto para los niños jugar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good material and fast material
reviews.reviewText: My son loved and is thrilled with this toy. He can’t get enough, he plays with it everyday. I loved the material and the inclusion of different accessories. It also arrived really fast. I recommend buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointing because it’s very fragile. I was trying to change the hand into another and it broke. Also it comes in Japanese or Chinese so instructions are useless .Will I buy this again? No I would not, not for that price maybe for like 10$ it remains me of the one of those toys you get at the swap meet.
